snippet.title: D-Day VR Museum - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Early Access Begins November 1st 2024!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2512870/DDay_VR_Museum/

Step into the heart of history and experience D-Day like never before. Our immersive VR tour transports you to the Normandy beaches, allowing you to witness firsthand the courage and sacrifice of those who fought for freedom. With realistic visuals, authentic sounds, and in-depth historical information.

#dday #ww2games #virtualreality
